body:
Would you like to send a PR to copy these + unit tests over?  I'll be
removing them in the next day or two.

On Tue, Feb 6, 2018 at 3:27 PM, Jerome <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> If you really intend to remove it, mind at least keeping some of the
> functions in there (like move them to contrib.layers or something)? I think
> images_to_sequence and sequence_to_images are pretty useful.
>
> —
